definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.english: Before athletics, you need to undresses, relieve the feces and urine, and drink a cup of warm boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 運動前寬衣解帶，解除大小便，最好喝杯溫開水。

sentences.english: You can imagine you smell urine in everybody's soup.
sentences.chinese: 你可以想象每個人的湯裏面都飄出一股子小便的味道。

sentences.english: In each of the urinals , there is a little printed blue fly.
sentences.chinese: 在每個小便池中，都印着一個小綠頭蒼蠅。

sentences.english: Please fill about a third of this container with urine.
sentences.chinese: 請解小便到杯內約三分之一處。

sentences.english: Just before dinner, Basil nipped out for a pee in a darkness full of animals.
sentences.chinese: 開飯之前，巴茲爾溜到外面充滿野獸的黑暗中去小便。

sentences.english: Would I still be at home if I had been housebroken ?
sentences.chinese: 如果當初我沒有在家裏大小便，你會不會讓我留下來？

sentences.english: She say you better not fuck on the table, you son of a 'beach'.
sentences.chinese: 她說，你最好不要在盤子裏小便，你個表字養的。

sentences.english: I have had burning or pain when I urinates.
sentences.chinese: 我小便時感到發燙和疼痛。

sentences.english: To the right were eight tall porcelain urinals.
sentences.chinese: 右邊是八個高大的陶瓷小便器。

sentences.english: Brian: what about when he poos and pees everywhere?
sentences.chinese: 如果它到處大小便怎麼辦？

sentences.english: When they are ready, most boys stand in front of the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 他們身體長大了，多數的男孩是站在便池前小便。

sentences.english: Lumbosacral lipoma can be responsible for progressive neurological and urological defects.
sentences.chinese: 腰骶部脂肪瘤導致了神經功能和小便功能的缺失。

sentences.english: You may also feel constant need to urinate.
sentences.chinese: 你可能還會感覺自己有經常想要小便。

sentences.english: Then, later, fishing up her shit and piss .
sentences.chinese: 再釣魚般用魚杆釣上去大便和小便。

sentences.english: They did right to put him up over a urinal : meeting of the waters.
sentences.chinese: 他們把他這座銅像豎在一座小便池上，倒是做對了。

definition: to support a child (or invalid etc) while he or she urinates
to pee pee (kiddie or feminine slang)
to drain (factory waste etc)/to excrete (urine, sweat etc)
to relieve oneself (i.e. use the toilet)/to solve
to pass water/to piss/to urinate/to wee wee
to poo poo (kiddie or feminine term)/also pr. [bian3 bian3]
